content.p: Honorary Associate Professor, Faculty of Social Sciences I am the Course Director for BSc. Environmental Sciences. Please contact me if you have any queries regarding this degree programme Module Convener: I also teach in a range of other modules in UG and PG in the areas of tropical ecology, sustainable development, statistics, research skills and hydrogeochemistry My research focus is Aquatic Ecology with a research focus on the inter-relationships between carbon flux, biogeochemistry and ecological community assemblage structure of aquatic and wetlandâ€¦ read more telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
